name: NO TIME 4 LOVE
description:
A game using only 1 button  consisting of either the left click mouse button or the A button for Xbox controllers. Basically the premise is you are trying to get the highest score you can by pressing the respective button repeatedly. 

The car asset used is from the permanent free section of the Epic Games UE4 Marketplace and the music is a short unmastered / mixed tune I popped out quickly for the Jam. This was a bit different then my usual games as I have been working on first person RPG's that I never finish so I thought I would mix it up and do a few game jams the next few months when I am not at work or busy with life. just to get a few complete games under my belt.

Feel free to check out the project on GitHub @ https://github.com/Sinpkr/OneButton_Jam2021

I wanted to add a leaderboard to the game but I am busy with work this coming week so I do not think I have too much time to work on this project.
